title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 502.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 502.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) Applications for the
issuance of certificates or permits, extensions of certificates or permits, transfer or leases of certificates or permits shall be made online in a manner
prescribed by the commissioner. (b) All such applications shall be submitted with all requested information. An
application which is incomplete may be rejected or denied. (c) A brief summary of every application, except applications for emergency/temporary authority, will be published in the
department's Weekly Bulletin of Motor Carrier Applications as soon after
receipt of the application as is practicable. The publication will include the
name and address of applicant's attorney or representative, if known. Unless
otherwise set forth in the Transportation Law, publication of an application in
the Weekly Bulletin shall be deemed good and sufficient notice to all
interested parties. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
